review: I have a xbox 360 so I'll be comparing this to that.PROS:Everything is much faster.CONS:It only searches amazon's selection. If it isn't free on amazon and is available on Hulu then it'll have that option. But if amazon doesn't even have it but Hulu does it won't show up.For example, if you search for The Amazing Race it show Seasons 1, 7 and 10 available for purchase for $1.99 per episode or for free through Hulu. But it doesn't show all the other seasons even though these are available in Hulu. You'd have to launch the Hulu app separately to watch them.
